system.description:
Telekinesis allows the psion to manipulate objects without physically touching them.

Lift 50 grams (PSI 1, 50m): lift and maneuver up to a 50 grams object for 1 minute (10 combat rounds).

Lift 1kg (PSI 2, 50m): lift and maneuver up to a 1kg object for 1D combat rounds. Can cause 1D damage if hurled at a target.

Lift 100kg (PSI 5, 50m): lift and maneuver up to a 100kg object for 1D combat rounds. This will cause 3D damage if hurled at a target.

Telekinetic Shield (PSI 3 but see cost below, personal): this creates an invisible barrier against fast moving attacks in front of the psion’s hand, covering a 1,5m x 1,5m area. This gives the user 2 points of armor protection for each PSI point spent on activation against attacks from that direction. After activated, it lasts until the beginning of the psion’s next round.

Choke (PSI 8, 10m): grab a single human-sized creature by its throat, or equivalent, and suffocate them for 1D damage per round, for a maximum number of rounds equal to the character's full PSI score.

Microkinesis (PSI 10 but see cost below, personal): manipulate microscopic objects. Microkinesis may be used for subtle, but highly effective attacks on internal organs, causing 1D damage per 2 PSI points spent. Alternatively, this power may aid microsurgery by +1 per 3 PSI points spent. Finally, the psion may assist Engineering and Repair skill checks by +1 per 3 PSI points spent.
